original_text: But when Paul wished to go in among the crowd, the disciples would not let him.
korean_text: 바울이 백성 가운데로 들어가고자 하나 제자들이 말리고

sentences.original_text: But when Paul wished to go in among the crowd
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 바울이 무리 가운데로 들어가고자 할 때에

sentences.original_text: the disciples would not let him.
